title: promote-node input
description: Promote a node to cluster leader

node_id.title: Node identifier
node_id.description: The node ID of the new leader node

endpoint_address.title: Endpoint address
endpoint_address.description: Host name or IP address where the new leader node can be reached by other nodes

endpoint_port.title: Endpoint UDP port for VPN
endpoint_port.description: The UDP port number where Wireguard is listening. It must be reachable by other cluster nodes

endpoint_validation.title: Endpoint validation flag
endpoint_validation.description: If set to "true", validate the endpoint with a connection attempt
